title: Add a custom action menu item to the communication option that has a custom display format

code_examples.code: viewConfigDiff: /**SCHEMA_VIEW_CONFIG_DIFF*/[    {        "operation": "merge",        /* Code of the "Communication options" component. */        "name": "ContactCommunicationOptions",        "values": {            "templates": {                /* Add a custom display format. */                "home_phone": {                    /* Type of the custom display format. Enter existing type in the "type" property. Otherwise, an error occurs. */                    "type": "crt.PhoneInput",                    "phoneAsLink": true,                    "displayAsPhone": true,                    "displayPhoneMask": true,                    ...                }            }        }    },    ...]/**SCHEMA_VIEW_CONFIG_DIFF*/,
code_examples.context: Set up the properties of thehome_phoneconfiguration object in the properties of thetemplatesconfiguration object.

code_examples.code: viewConfigDiff: /**SCHEMA_VIEW_CONFIG_DIFF*/[    {        "operation": "merge",        /* Code of the "Communication options" component. */        "name": "ContactCommunicationOptions",        "values": {            "templates": {                /* Add a custom display format. */                "home_phone": {                    ...,                    /* Action menu of the custom display format. */                    "tools": [{                        /* Type of the custom display format. Enter existing type in the "type" property. Otherwise, an error occurs. */                        "type": 'crt.Button',                        "icon": 'actions-button-icon',                        "iconPosition": 'only-icon',                        "color": 'default',                        "size": 'none',                        "clickMode": 'menu',                        "displayType": 'text',                        "classes": ['actions-btn'],                        "menuItems": [                            /* Action menu item. */                            {                                "type": 'crt.MenuItem',                                /* The name of the custom action menu item. */                                "caption": '#ResourceString(ShowNotification_caption)#',                                /* The icon of the custom action menu item. */                                "icon": 'message-warn-button-icon',                                /* Property that controls the visibility of the custom action menu item. */                                "visible": true,                                "clicked": {                                    /* Bind the "crt.NotificationRequest" request to the "clicked" event of the custom action menu item. */                                    "request": 'crt.NotificationRequest',                                    /* Add custom request parameters. */                                    "params": {                                        "message": 'Notification message'                                    },                                }                            }                        ]                    }]                }            }        }    },    ...]/**SCHEMA_VIEW_CONFIG_DIFF*/,
code_examples.context: Set up the properties of the action menu itemin themenuItemsarray of configuration objects.

Otherwise, an error occurs. */                            "type": "crt.PhoneInput",                            "phoneAsLink": true,                            "displayAsPhone": true, 'crt.MenuItem',                                        /* The name of the custom action menu item. */                                        "caption": '#ResourceString(ShowNotification_caption)#', Property that controls the visibility of the custom action menu item. */                                        "visible": true,                                        "clicked": { 'crt.NotificationRequest',                                            /* Add custom request parameters. */                                            "params": { callouts.title: Note
callouts.content: noteThe example is relevant to Creatio version 8.0.9 and later.

callouts.title: Home phone
callouts.content: ExampleImplement thehome_phonecustom display format for theHome phonecommunication option on the contact page. Add theShow notificationitem to the action menu of theHome phonecommunication option. Display theNotification messagemessage when clicking on the item.
callouts.html:
Example

Implement the home_phone custom display format for the Home phone communication option on the contact page. Add the Show notification item to the action menu of the Home phone communication option. Display the Notification message message when clicking on the item.

callouts.title: Home phone
callouts.content: Implement thehome_phonecustom display format for theHome phonecommunication option on the contact page. Add theShow notificationitem to the action menu of theHome phonecommunication option. Display theNotification messagemessage when clicking on the item.
callouts.html: Implement the home_phone custom display format for the Home phone communication option on the contact page. Add the Show notification item to the action menu of the Home phone communication option. Display the Notification message message when clicking on the item.

images.context: Implement thehome_phonecustom display format for theHome phonecommunication option on the contact pa
Open theLookupssection. To do this, clickin the top right →System setup→Lookups.
Change theDisplay formatcolumn of theHome phonecommunication option from "phone" to "home_phone."
Open the contact form page. To do this, clickin the top right →Application management→Application Hu
As a result, theHome phonecommunication option will have thehome_phonedisplay format.
Open the contact form page. To do this, clickin the top right →Application management→Application Hu
